text: Todd Nance (November 20, 1962 - August 19, 2020) was an American blues rock drummer. He was best known as the original drummer of Widespread Panic. He was a member of the band until 2016. He was born in Chattanooga, Tennessee. Nance died on August 19, 2020 at the age of 57.In Memoriam: Widespread Panic Founding Drummer Todd Nance 1962 â€“ 2020 ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American drummers Category:American blues musicians Category:American rock musicians Category:Musicians from Chattanooga, Tennessee
title: Todd Nance
